name: Cold Cuts
description:
You are Samurai Hack, a questionably-licensed practitioner of the samurai blade. While looking for things to hone your blade against, you are contracted by various companies that - due to various unforeseen circumstances - have a need for your cutting skills. Slice up objects that will test your speed, precision, accuracy, or any combination of the aforementioned.

Learn your ways about a samurai blade as you cut up objects in an precise and accurate manner to get more points. Cut up certain objects for power ups such as time-slowing to better enhance your cutting precision. Try to reach for the highest score for each level.

Key Features
- Wield your samurai blade in VR
- Objects fly towards you for you to cut
- Cut objects from any angle
- Cut objects into different shapes
- Cut specific objects in half to get bonus points
- Cut specific objects to slow down time

Cut-able Objects
- wood board
- wood plank
- cheese
